author: Puidwen
title: A very nice set for a kid
review: My sister got this for me as a joke.  She thought my lego shelf look like a junk yard.  Some of the parts have a nasty tendency to get stuck in the bag.  I honestly thought that this set was missing serval pieces??????? before i found them.  Overall it's a very nice looking set.  The dump truck is a very nice bright orange.  You can see some injection points on the dumpster, but it is still nice looking.  This was a very easy, quick build appropriate for set aimed at children.  Both minfigs, have a nice but basic print on the body.  I will say the the dirt on the male minfig's face, give more of a cyborg impresion.
